stories.headline: Finding 'missing' kids
stories.summary: A data investigation revealed that at least 10% of children listed as missing in a circulation area were not missing at all due to police oversight. This led to uncovering flaws in the state's system.

stories.headline: Survey helps explain heart attack survival
stories.summary: An investigation into varying cardiac arrest survival rates across cities highlighted how some save substantially more victims due to differing emergency response capabilities.

stories.headline: Making the connection between doctors, ODs
stories.summary: A series exposed Florida doctors prescribing large quantities of narcotics to low-income Medicaid users, leading to high financial costs and overdose deaths.
